feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.132.4-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(oidc): add azure docs for OIDC authentication by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3715
  • fix(gateway): allow multiple requests when using http proxy by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3751
  • fix invite bug by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3721
  • feat: assume role mode for aws dynamic secret iam by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3750
  • feat: added k8s metadata in template policy by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3752
  • feature(gcp-sync): Add support for syncing to locations by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3738
  • Add identityName to Dynamic Secrets userName template by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3722
  • feature(group-projects): Add project group details page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.132.3-postgres...infisical/v0.132.4-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.133.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(PIT-revamp): snapshot changes for PIT revamp and add docs for ne… by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3749
  • feat: added dynamic credential support and gateway auth to k8 dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3746
  • feat(gateway): multiple authentication methods by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3753
  • fix: re-added merge user logic by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3761
  • Check non re2 regex workflow by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3693
  • improvement(project-webhooks): Add webhook triggered audit log by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3754
  • feat(PIT): Point In Time Revamp by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3758
  • feat(docs): Added a small note to clarify the usage of the env variable INFISICAL_API_URL for EU users by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3766
  • feat(secret-rotation): fix metadata empty objects breaking version co… by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3771
  • feat(gateway): use gateway for full k8s request life-cycle by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3769
  • fix: allow for empty target URLs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3772
  • feat(pit): improve commit changes condition as some old versions can be zero by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3773
  • disable caching for frontend assets by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3765
  • Update aws-iam.mdx by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3774
  • feat: allow k8 dynamic secret multi namespace and show proper error by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3767
  • feat(secret-request): hide secret value on missing secret read permission by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3778
  • feat(secret-rotation): Azure Client Secrets manually deleted client secrets check by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3780
  • misc: added project slug flag support to dynamic secret commands by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3779
  • feat(invite-users): fix issue where invitations were not sent when the actor was an identity by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3781
  • feat(docs): Packer Plugin Docs by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3763
  • docs(identities/aws-auth): eks pod auth by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3762
  • feat(pit): improve banner messaging for PITR by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3784
  • fix(docs): add a tip on Auth0 SAML doc tip by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3785
  • improvement(secret-scanning): Multi-select actions by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3782
  • feat(machine-identity): Alibaba Cloud by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3775
  • feat(dynamic-secrets): GCP IAM by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3552
  • Update wording for service tokens by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3787
  • Feat/azure devops secret sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3736
  • feat(secret-rotation): Oracle Database by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3755
  • misc: add verification pipelines for helm charts by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3735
  • feat: Sequentail access approval request by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3777
  • fix(docs): replace tip to warning on Auth0 Auth by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3786
  • fix: hidden secret value in secret approvals by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3790
  • fix(secret-sync): allow users to input custom branch names on Vercel by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3788
  • doc: add scope breakdown section to design doc by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3793
  • Add a condition to only limit the number of projects to SecretManager by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3796
  • misc: add custom role slug in fetch group by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3789
  • feat(machine-identities): Delete protection by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3795
  • doc: production hardening by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3801
  • fix: editing secrets with value hidden by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3808
  • improvement(project-roles): Add pagination, search and column sorting to Project Roles table by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3803
  • improvement(access-tree): dynamic secret conditional display by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3807
  • improvement(project-access-control): minor UI adjustments for consistency by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3805
  • feat(secret-sync, app-connection): Fly.io Secret Sync + App Connection by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3802
  • improvement(service-tokens): Improve Service Tokens Table by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3804
  • feat(secret-syncs): better permissioning by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3810
  • docs: update .net sdk by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3815
  • fix: updated aws principal arn field size to 2048 by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3817
  • fix: resolved failing duplication of predefined roles by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3819
  • feat: render app connection and secret sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3791
  • feat: resolved okta oidc failing by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3823
  • feat(secret-sync): Add Heroku Secret Sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3806
  • feat(dynamic-secret): Add custom tags to AWS IAM dynamic secret by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3809
  • feat: patched up approval sequence ui bugs by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3826
  • Fix CLI issue by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3827
  • feat(dynamic-secret): Github App Tokens by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3821
  • Docs links fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3831
  • feat: added min 0 for knexjs pool by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3813
  • doc: add mention of helm install for pki issuer by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3824
  • improvements(approval-workflows): Improve Approval Workflow Tables and Add Additional Functionality by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3822
  • doc: architecture for US and EU cloud by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3840
  • fix(dynamic-secrets/k8s): fix for SSL when not using gateway by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3841
  • sort tax ID dropdown by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3842

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.132.4-postgres...infisical/v0.133.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.133.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: migrated dynamic secret to pg queue and corrected service layer by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3833
  • misc: add self-serve for github app connection setup by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3834
  • fix(folders): duplicate folders by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3846
  • Add projectSlug parameter on secrets v3 endpoints by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3816
  • feat: added cloudflare app connection and secret sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3825
  • feat: added auto-bootstrap support to helm by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3818
  • improve audit log streams: add backend logs + DD source by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3848
  • feat: added copy token button by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3853
  • fix(secret-sharing): Support self-hosted for "share your own secret" link by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3847
  • Allow undefined value for tags to prevent unwanted overrides by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3851
  • fix(docs): sdk and changelog tab not loading by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3856
  • docs: fix redirect for .NET SDK by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3857

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.133.0-postgres...infisical/v0.133.1-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.134.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(secret-sync): Add gitlab secret sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3835
  • improvement(project-policies): Revamp edit role page and access tree by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3850
  • improvement(secret-overview): Add collapsed environment view to secret overview page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3859
  • improvement(secret-sync/app-connection): Add search/pagination to secret sync and app connection selection modals by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3860
  • chore(secret-scanning-v1): remove secret scanning v1 queue and webhook endpoint by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3863
  • Clarify relationship between path and key schema for AWS parameter store by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3864
  • fix(checkbox): Remove manual css overrides of checkbox checked state by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3865

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.133.1-postgres...infisical/v0.134.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.135.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(telemetry): Add aggregated events and groups to posthog by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3866
  • feat: TLS cert identity auth by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3852
  • improvement(project-roles): Add type col to project roles table and default sort by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3871
  • improvement(access-policies): Revamp approval sequence table display and access request modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3869
  • update logos in docs by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3880
  • update spend policy by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3881
  • feat: resolved inefficient join for ip restriction in access token by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3882
  • improvement(org-access-control): Standardize and improve org access control UI by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3873
  • Fix bypassing approval policies by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3878
  • misc: add indices for referencing columns in identity access token by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3885
  • improvement(secret-approval-request): Color/layout styling adjustments to change request page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3891
  • feat(secret-sync): Allow custom field label on 1pass sync by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3876
  • fix: address instanceof check in github dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3894
  • improvement(approval-policy): minor create policy layout adjustments by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3889
  • misc: added missing project cert endpoints to open api spec by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3893
  • feat(super-admin): Environment Overrides by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3875
  • doc: add mention of default audience support for CSI by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3883
  • misc: updated sidebar name by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3896
  • misc: add plain support for user get token in CLI by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3897
  • feat(change-approvals): block folder deletion if there is at least one secret protected by a policy by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3903
  • improvement(approval-policies): Add open request warning to remove policy modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3886
  • feat: project ui v3 by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3872
  • feat: Re-invite users every 1 week for up to a month. by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3892
  • feat: audit log improvement by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3906
  • misc: update tooltip for overwrite sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3909
  • misc: downsize worker count for secret scanning jobs by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3910
  • improvement: allow users to expand collapsed environment view header by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3904
  • Fix root folder issue with folder policies check and multi env error message improvement by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3911
  • fix(secret-folders): delete folder by ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3913
  • feat(secret-sync): add Zabbix secret sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3870
  • Undo Environment Variables Override PR Revert + SSO Fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3918
  • improvement(password-reset): re-vamp password reset flow pages/steps to match login by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3905
  • fix(secret-syncs): pass audit log info from import/delete secrets for sync endpoint by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3920
  • misc: allow users with create permission to add identities with no access by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.134.0-postgres...infisical/v0.135.0-postgres
